title: Create student data management system with add and edit capabilities

requirements.text: Create a Motoko backend actor with a Student type containing name (Text), email (Text), and uid (Text) fields, and a stable variable to store an array of students that persists across upgrades
acceptanceCriteria: Student type defined with name, email, and uid as Text fields
Stable storage implemented to preserve data across canister upgrades
Data structure supports multiple student records

requirements.text: Implement backend methods to add a new student record, retrieve all students, update an existing student by index or unique identifier, and return appropriate success/error responses

quotes: I want the user to be able to edit the entered data
add new students, edit existing records, and view the list

acceptanceCriteria: addStudent method accepts name, email, and uid parameters and stores the record
getAllStudents method returns the complete list of student records
updateStudent method allows modification of existing student data
Methods return clear success or error responses

requirements.text: Create a React frontend with a form containing input fields for student name, email, and UID where users can manually enter data and submit to add new records
acceptanceCriteria: Form displays three input fields labeled Name, Email, and UID
Submit button adds the student record to the backend
Form validates that all fields are filled before submission
Form clears after successful submission

requirements.text: Display a list of all student records showing name, email, and UID with an edit button for each record that allows users to modify the data

quotes: I want the user to be able to edit the entered data

acceptanceCriteria: Student records display in a clear, organized format
Each record shows name, email, and UID fields
Edit button is present for each student record
Clicking edit allows modification of student data
Changes save to the backend and update the display

requirements.text: Implement the frontend with no authentication or login requirements, allowing public access to all features

quotes: let anyone be able to access

acceptanceCriteria: Website loads without requiring login
All features (add, edit, view) are accessible immediately
No authentication barriers or user management present

requirements.text: Design the interface with a warm, educational theme using earthy tones like terracotta and sage green with clean typography and card-based layouts for student records
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color scheme using warm, educational tones
Clear typography that enhances readability
Student records presented in organized card or table format
Interface feels welcoming and appropriate for educational data management

constraints: No authentication or user management system
UID must be manually entered by users, not auto-generated
All data operations must be publicly accessible
